openscap.profile_description: This profile contains configuration checks for Red Hat Enterprise Linux 9 that align to the Australian Cyber Security Centre (ACSC) Essential Eight.  A copy of the Essential Eight in Linux Environments guide can be found at the ACSC website:  https://www.cyber.gov.au/acsc/view-all-content/publications/hardening-linux-workstations-and-servers
openscap.profile_name: Australian Cyber Security Centre (ACSC) Essential Eight
